description: The Men’s Merino Sport 150 Tank is crafted to help you feel comfortable as you move, even if your intensity heats up. Its fabric is a blend of responsibly sourced Merino wool and polyester, for moisture management, temperature regulation, odor resistance, quick dry times, and durability. And it’s got flatlock seams that help prevent chafing. For any sweat-inducing activity—from hiking to running to climbing—this tank is here to help you stay comfy.
name: Smartwool Merino Sport 150 Tank - Mens
